title: What happens to the people who bought the 7 Rune page bundle?
body: So, I have 10 rune pages, 2 that I got by default, 1 that I bought for IP and 7 from the said Rune page bundle that currently costs 2600 RP, when the rune system gets reworked, will we get that RP back?

replies.body: Currently as I understand it from our[ dev announcement](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/RlNQkO39-buying-runes-between-now-and-preseason), rune pages are not expected to refund because it will still transition over.  Should that change in the future, it will likely be updated there or through a [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) announcement.  I hear you, though, this isn't something I can change.  Continue letting your voice be heard and share your feedback with them.

Hi, I don't care about the refund (I spent rp on the pages I'm pretty sure tho) but I just want to point out that rune pages transitioning to the new system but beeing editable means that every rune page bought is still wasted. Seems like you guys play dumb about this and it annoys me much more than the refund that I wouldn't care about anyway
Exactly. It was mandatory before so thats why most people bought them.

It's insane to me that since 1 month ago discussion has been:
Player: I want muh rp for pages back
Rito: you can still uses the pages so no rp for you, ha
Player: but having 1 editable rune page is worth more than 900 non editable ones
Rito: oh look! A new pentakill song/ a new skin / a flying rabbit!
Alright, hopefully it changes. Dont wanna let that 2.6k RP go to waste or else it'd be {{item:3070}}

The only reason I bought the bundle because it felt mandatory, and it just isnt now. So I really think it isnt fair if we (who bought the bundle or bought pages at all) dont get it back. It would be a huge waste of money on our part and really wouldnt feel good at all.
